name: literarily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to literature : I knew that if the novel was sold as a romance I'd never be reviewed by any literarily respectable newspaper. A lot of people see these books as children's literature that is not worth anything, literarily speaking.
More examplesFewer examplesHer final novel is perhaps the most literarily accomplished of her works.In his novels, he reinvents the past literarily, with a great deal of style, wit, and suspense.He was enriched literarily by each one of his women friends, some of whom found a place in his poems.
